long_description: The Micro is lightweight and carries just the essentials to keep your ride swift and sleek! Unique, positive locking two-piece rail fixer securely attaches bag to seat and allows you to remove it in a snap. Constructed with tough, high-quality 1000-denier Cordura Plus(R) nylon. 3M(R) reflective stripe on rear side helps increase your visibility to motorists.
short_description: The Micro is lightweight and carries just the essentials to keep your ride swift and sleek!
